ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, guys. Before you kill me, know this: I didn t do it on purpouse. Something I was making backfired upon testing and destroyed all the character profiles

Ok, guys. Before you kill me, know this: I didn't do it on purpouse.

Something I was making backfired upon testing and destroyed all the
character profiles except for Alloran's (very strange occurance). It
also mutilated the character editor. Nothing really works right now,
and I'm fixing it, but I just wanted to tell you guys so that you
could get started with retyping your char profiles, because I don't
have backups (Alloran's are still there, so he doesn't have to type
them up). I'm sorry about all this, But it gives me work too.
